headline: Opinion: Heimlich working to restore Republican Party's integrity
author: Dave Caudill
sentences: Sarah Longwell, the group’s executive director and publisher of The Bulwark (thebulwark.com), a news network that provides political reporting and analysis "free from the constraints of partisan loyalties," attempted to explain the power of the "Big Lie" that Trump won the 2020 election.
